com.usc.bill.service

Class BillServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.usc.bill.service.BillServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BillService

    @Service
public class BillServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BillService
    A common interface to handle business operations that concerns generating charges and applying payment for student within the scope of the current requirement
    Version:
    1.0 11/19/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, STROUD

    • Method Detail

      • addPayment

        @Transactional
public void addPayment(java.lang.String userId,
                                       java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                       java.lang.String note)
                                throws UserNotFoundException,
                                       NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                                       UserPermissionException
        to add a payment against the current student's bill
        Specified by:
        addPayment in interface BillService
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of student where payment will be applied
        amount - a mount in dollar currency
        note - a reason for the payment
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user associated with a given id is not existed in the system
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user

      • getAllCharges

        @Transactional
public Bill getAllCharges(java.lang.String userId,
                                          java.util.Date startDate,
                                          java.util.Date endDate)
                                   throws NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                                          UserPermissionException,
                                          UserNotFoundException,
                                          NoBillExistedException
        to get the charges and payment made within the range of dates given presented in Bill object
        Specified by:
        getAllCharges in interface BillService
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of user that is associated with transaction
        startDate - a start date where transactions' dates fall after it
        endDate - an end date where transactions' dates fall before it
        Returns:
        bill consisted of student of profile along wiht charges, payment within the range of dates given
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user
        UserNotFoundException - in case no user is logged in
        NoBillExistedException - if there is no bill existed for the given user id
        See Also:
        Bill

      • loadTransactions

        @Transactional
public void loadTransactions(java.lang.String filename)
                                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                             java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                             org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                             NoStudentProfileFoundException
        to load transactions contained in student record file that is formated as a JSON into the system datasource
        Specified by:
        loadTransactions in interface BillService
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file where the record of transaction existed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file associated with a given filename doesn't exist
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the given filename has improper format
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file associated with a given filename couldn't be parsed into JSONArray
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if student with user id associated with transaction doesn't exist
